org.netbeans.core.startup.layers

Class LayerCacheManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.core.startup.layers.LayerCacheManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.netbeans.core.startup.base.LayerFactory

    public abstract class LayerCacheManager
extends Object
implements org.netbeans.core.startup.base.LayerFactory
    Interface for a manager which can handle XML layer caching.
    See Also:
    "#20168"

        public static LayerCacheManager create(String cacheLocation)
        Creates new cache manager for given cache location. The location shall be unique file name.
        Parameters:
        cacheLocation - unique file name
        Returns:
        cache manager

        public final FileSystem loadCache()
                           throws IOException
        Loads the filesystem from cache if cache is available.
        Specified by:
        loadCache in interface org.netbeans.core.startup.base.LayerFactory
        Returns:
        the file system read or null, if the cache is out of date

      • additionalLayers

        public List<URL> additionalLayers(List<URL> urls)
        Provides additiona layers to be configured for the target FileSystem
        Specified by:
        additionalLayers in interface org.netbeans.core.startup.base.LayerFactory
        Parameters:
        urls - initial set of URLs
        Returns:
        modified set of URLs to create a filesystem with.
        Since:
        1.60

      • createEmptyFileSystem

        public abstract FileSystem createEmptyFileSystem()
                                          throws IOException
        Create an empty cache filesystem, i.e. with no initial layers. Should only be called when the cache directory is clean. Should not be overridden if the manager does not support loading; otherwise must be overridden.
        Specified by:
        createEmptyFileSystem in interface org.netbeans.core.startup.base.LayerFactory
        Throws:
        IOException

      • load

        public abstract FileSystem load(FileSystem previous,
                                ByteBuffer bb)
                         throws IOException
        Load the cache from disk. Should only be called when the cache directory is prepared. The filesystem's contents should be modified. The filesystem must have been originally produced by createEmptyFileSystem() or #createLoadedFileSystem. Not called if the manager does not support loading; otherwise must be overridden.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • store

        public abstract void store(FileSystem fs,
                           List<URL> urls,
                           OutputStream os)
                    throws IOException
        Save a new cache to disk, load it, and return that filesystem.
        Parameters:
        urls - list of type URL; earlier layers can override later layers
        Throws:
        IOException
